Season 1, Episode 6: Broken
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½28 October 2002
A mother loses sight of her daughter Ruthie for a few seconds only later to find that her little girl is now dead at the hand of a pedophile. As the investigation continues, the detectives realize that they are dealing with a serial pedophile.

Season 1, Episode 7: Breathless
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½4 November 2002

Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½11 November 2002

Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½6 January 2003

Season 1, Episode 13: Bunk
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½27 January 2003

Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½3 February 2003

Season 1, Episode 15: Dead Woman Walking
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½10 February 2003

Season 1, Episode 16: Evidence of Things Unseen
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½17 February 2003

________________________________________
Season 1, Episode 17: Simple Man
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½24 February 2003
Horatio Caine is in the middle of a trial for the murder of a Latina house keeper shot dead in her car. The prime suspect is a politician's husband. Just before his testimony, another similar case occurs, prompting Horatio to believe that they may have caught the wrong guy. He asks for the trial to be put on hold for 24 hours while he and his team examine the new evidence.
________________________________________
Season 1, Episode 18: Dispo Day
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½10 March 2003
The crime lab is transporting confiscated drugs to an industrial burner. En route, the convoy is attacked, which results in one officer's death, and the drugs are stolen. The entire team is under investigation as it is suspected that someone on the inside leaked information about the date and time.
________________________________________
Season 1, Episode 19: Double Cap
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½31 March 2003
The murder of a woman at a posh hotel has ties to the drug cartel, a bank robbery, and the witness protection program.

Season 1, Episode 20: Grave Young Men

________________________________________

Season 1, Episode 22: Tinder Box
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½5 May 2003
A crowded nightclub burns down, leaving many injured and dead. The ensuing investigation leads the detectives to suspect that the fire is not an accident.
________________________________________
Season 1, Episode 23: Freaks and Tweaks
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½12 May 2003
The body of a drug addict is found in a barn. Horatio, Eric, and Tim investigate the scene and nearly died when the place explodes. The case becomes personal to Horatio when one of the suspects claim to know Raymond Caine, his brother. Calleigh is working with Det. John Hagen on the case of a man shot dead to the heart in his car. The man turns out to be Alex's friend.
________________________________________
Season 1, Episode 24: Body Count
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½19 May 2003
Three prisoners break out of prison. One of them is a child molester, previously caught by the CSI team, who is looking for his new victim as the detectives race against time to stop him. Another is out to get revenge against the people who got him convicted, one of whom is detective Calleigh Duquesne.
